author: mbenson
msg: allow @s before the "real" one in scp uris.  Bugzilla 38082.

author: rickhall
msg: Fixed the pom file bug reported by Clement (FELIX-88).

author: dennisl
msg: Add plugin relocators that handle plugins that has changed their groupId and/or artifactId between Maven 1 and Maven 2.
A plugin relocator is a plexus component. To add a new plugin relocator you just add a class that implements the PluginRelocator interface.

author: rjung
msg: Use ap_log_error instead of ap_log_rerror when we don't know, whether we are in a request context.
